channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- RSLinx Classic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- RSLinx Classic

item.title: CVE-2019-6553|2024-08-04T20:23:21.569Z -- rockwell%20automation -- rslinx%20classic
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Rockwell Automation RSLinx Classic versions 4.10.00 and prior. An input validation issue in a .dll file of RSLinx Classic where the data in a Forward Open service request is passed to a fixed size buffer, allowing an attacker to exploit a stack-based buffer overflow condition.
